xxl.core.predicates
Class ComparatorPredicate<P>

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.predicates.Predicate<P>
      xxl.core.predicates.ComparatorPredicate<P>
Type Parameters:
P - the type of the predicate's parameters.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComparatorBasedEqual, Greater, Less
public abstract class ComparatorPredicate<P>
extends Predicate<P>

This abstract class provides a predicate that uses an underlying comparator for determining whether it is fulfilled or not. The comparator predicate is an abstract class because no invoke method has been overwritten such that the predicate's recursion mechanism will cause an infinite loop for every call.

See Also:
Comparator, Serialized Form

Field Detail

comparator

protected Comparator<? super P> comparator
A reference to the wrapped comparator. This reference is used to perform comparisons on given objects during method calls.

Constructor Detail

ComparatorPredicate

public ComparatorPredicate(Comparator<? super P> comparator)
Creates a new comparator predicate that uses the given comparator for comparisons on specified objects.

Parameters:
comparator - the comparator that is used for comparisons on given objects.
Method Detail

getComparatorPredicate

public static <P> ComparatorPredicate<P> getComparatorPredicate(Comparator<? super P> comp,
                                                                boolean greaterZero,
                                                                boolean zero,
                                                                boolean lowerZero)
Creates a ComparatorPredicate with the given comparator. If the result of the Comparator is > 0 the Predicate returns greaterZero, lowerZero if the Comparator return a value < 0 and zero if the Comparator is 0.

Type Parameters:
P - the type of the predicate's parameters.
Parameters:
comp - the comparator that is used for comparisons on given objects.
greaterZero - result for comparator values greater 0.
zero - result for comparator values equal 0.
lowerZero - result for comparator values lower 0.
Returns:
the comparator-predicate.
